resources.name: Make a new articles
resources.description:
Use this API route to post a new post, supoort multiple image

Request param
```
title : required|string
content : required|string
```

Response  :
```
{
	"meta": {
		"success": true,
		"code": 20000,
		"message": "Request success"
	},
	"data": {
		"title": "Membuat Indonesia Maju",
		"content": "Indonesia adalah negara yang maju. 1' kali maju "2 kali"",
		"author": 1,
		"status": 0,
		"updated_at": "2023-06-06T08:38:35.000000Z",
		"created_at": "2023-06-06T08:38:35.000000Z",
		"id": 8
	}
}
```

params.name: content
params.value: Indonesia adalah negara yang maju. 1' kali maju "2 kali"

resources.name: Update an article
resources.description:
Request param
```
title : nullable|string
content : nullable|string
```


Response : 
```
{
	"meta": {
		"success": true,
		"code": 20000,
		"message": "Request success"
	},
	"data": {
		"id": 6,
		"title": "Title yang lebih baru 2",
		"content": "<br>Halo masyarakat indonesia<h1>",
		"author": 1,
		"status": 0,
		"created_at": "2023-06-06T08:21:39.000000Z",
		"updated_at": "2023-06-06T08:21:51.000000Z"
	}
}
```

resources.name: Make a new comment
resources.description:
Request params :
```
article_id : required|exists
comment : required|string
```
Response : 
```
{
	"meta": {
		"success": true,
		"code": 20000,
		"message": "Request success"
	},
	"data": {
		"user_id": 1,
		"blog_id": "7",
		"comment": "Luar biasa",
		"updated_at": "2023-06-06T08:28:58.000000Z",
		"created_at": "2023-06-06T08:28:58.000000Z",
		"id": 4
	}
}
```

resources.name: Update a comment
resources.description:
Request params :
```
article_id : required|exists
comment : required|string
```
Response : 
```
{
	"meta": {
		"success": true,
		"code": 20000,
		"message": "Request success"
	},
	"data": {
		"user_id": 1,
		"blog_id": "7",
		"comment": "Luar biasa edited",
		"updated_at": "2023-06-06T08:28:58.000000Z",
		"created_at": "2023-06-06T08:28:58.000000Z",
		"id": 4
	}
}
```

resources.name: Delete a comment
resources.description:
Request params :
```
article_id : required|exists
```
Response : 
```
{
	"meta": {
		"success": true,
		"code": 20000,
		"message": "Request success"
	},
	"data": true
}
```

resources.name: Like, dislike article and remove like or dislike
resources.description:
Request params :
```
article_id : required|exists
type : required|in:like,dislike
```
Response : 
```
{
	"meta": {
		"success": true,
		"code": 20000,
		"message": "Request success"
	},
	"data": {
		"id": 3,
		"article_id": 8,
		"user": {
			"id": 1,
			"name": "Rudianto Sihombing",
			"email": "rudi97278@gmail.com",
			"roles": "user",
			"created_at": "2023-04-19T01:19:47.000000Z",
			"updated_at": "2023-04-19T01:19:47.000000Z"
		},
		"reaction": 1,
		"created_at": "2023-06-06T08:54:44.000000Z",
		"updated_at": "2023-06-06T08:54:44.000000Z"
	}
}
```
